name: dicy
description: A fast-paced, neon-styled dice strategy game. Inspired by the tactical depth of DiceWars and Kdice, Diception delivers quick turns and intense territory conquest.

scripts.tauri:build:mac: tauri build --bundles app && rm -rf dist-steam && mkdir -p dist-steam && cp -r src-tauri/target/release/bundle/macos/*.app dist-steam/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.tauri:build:win: tauri build --bundles nsis && rm -rf dist-steam && mkdir dist-steam && cp src-tauri/target/release/*.exe dist-steam/ 2>/dev/null || true
